author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce, depositi o/n in rialzo a 705,176 mld euro, prestiti 12 mln Bond |
text: FRANKFURT, Jan 5 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros. TODAY PREV Use of overnight loan facility 12 53 Use of overnight deposit facility 705,176 696,782 For additional details click here For details of previous ECB overnight lending operations, see: here For data on ECB market operations please click For Reuters calculation of money market liquidity level please click .
